import "./product-card.styles.scss" import Button from "../button/button.component" import { CartContext } from "../../context/cart.context" import { useContext } from "react" const ProductCard = ({product}) => { const {name, price, imageUrl} = product const {item,setItem} = useContext(CartContext) const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefult } return
{name} {price}
} export default ProductCard
